overview: My Wife's A Whore - Mia Malkova and her husband want to have whatever they want, whenever they want it.  Such A Dirty Little Whore - Aaliyah Love makes a weekly house-call to her favorite client. Keiran is married, and seeks things he can't get from his wife.  Visual Foreplay - In every marriage, there's a partner with secret fantasies and desires. Aryana loves to please her husband, so when he asks her to fuck a stranger in front of him, she's more than willing to do it.  Bend Over, Valentine - Yurizan & Johnny have been married for a few years, but it doesn't mean the fire in their loins has gone out far from it! It's Valentine's Day, and lovely Yurizan has something special planned for Johnny in the bathroom.  Happy Get On Your Knees Day - It's Johhny's birthday, & Vanilla is throwing him a surprise with his colleagues. Jessa from the office is bored and the only fuckable guy is Johnny!
tagline: The hottest horniest wives for your enjoyment!
title: Horny Housewives
